Html:
upload and read the micrsoft 2007 excel and write into database

any one got example that upload and read the micrsoft 2007 excel and write into database?

thank

There's plenty of example for reading the data from Excel spreadsheets, here on the discussion boards and in the /Tests and /Documentation/Examples folders. To insert data into a database depends on what database you're using, and the structure of the tables.
